verses.verse: וְהָ֣אָדָ֔ם <WH120> And Adam יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> had אֶת־ <WH853> חַוָּ֣ה <WH2332> Eve אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> his wife וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <WH2029> and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and gave אֶת־ <WH853> קַ֔יִן <WH7014> Cain וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said קָנִ֥יתִי <WH7069> I have gotten אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man אֶת־ <WH854> from יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַתֹּ֣סֶף <WH3254> And she again לָלֶ֔דֶת <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֖יו <WH251> his brother אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֑בֶל <WH1893> Abel וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become הֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH1893> And Abel רֹ֣עֵה <WH7462> was a keeper צֹ֔אן <WH6629> of sheep וְקַ֕יִן <WH7014> but Cain הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become עֹבֵ֥ד <WH5647> was a tiller אֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the ground

וַֽיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came מִקֵּ֣ץ <WH7093> And in process יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> of time וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> brought קַ֜יִן <WH7014> it came to pass that Cain מִפְּרִ֧י <WH6529> of the fruit הָֽאֲדָמָ֛ה <WH127> of the ground מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> an offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהֶ֨בֶל <WH1893> And Abel הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> also brought גַם־ <WH1571> his part ה֛וּא <WH1931> he מִבְּכֹר֥וֹת <WH1062> of the firstlings צֹאנ֖וֹ <WH6629> of his flock וּמֵֽחֶלְבֵהֶ֑ן <WH2459> and of the fat וַיִּ֣שַׁע <WH8159> had respect יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> thereof And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about הֶ֖בֶל <WH1893> unto Abel וְאֶל־ <WH413> and מִנְחָתֽוֹ׃ <WH4503> and to his offering

וְאֶל־ <WH413> about קַ֥יִן <WH7014> But unto Cain וְאֶל־ <WH413> and מִנְחָת֖וֹ <WH4503> and to his offering לֹ֣א <WH3808> no שָׁעָ֑ה <WH8159> he had not respect וַיִּ֤חַר <WH2734> wroth לְקַ֙יִן֙ <WH7014> And Cain מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> was very וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> fell פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> and his countenance

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to קָ֑יִן <WH7014> unto Cain לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> Why חָ֣רָה <WH2734> Why art thou wroth לָ֔ךְ וְלָ֖מָּה <WH4100> Why נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> fallen פָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> ? and why is thy countenance

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not אִם־ <WH518> If תֵּיטִיב֙ <WH3190> thou doest well שְׂאֵ֔ת <WH7613> will not be lifted וְאִם֙ <WH518> and if לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵיטִ֔יב <WH3190> well לַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> at the door חַטָּ֣את <WH2403> sin רֹבֵ֑ץ <WH7257> lieth וְאֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> and תְּשׁ֣וּקָת֔וֹ <WH8669> And unto thee [shall be] his desire וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you תִּמְשָׁל־ <WH4910> and thou shalt rule בּֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> talked קַ֖יִן <WH7014> And Cain אֶל־ <WH413> with הֶ֣בֶל <WH1893> Abel אָחִ֑יו <WH251> his brother וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בִּהְיוֹתָ֣ם <WH1961> came בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> and it came to pass when they were in the field וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> rose up קַ֛יִן <WH7014> that Cain אֶל־ <WH413> against הֶ֥בֶל <WH1893> Abel אָחִ֖יו <WH251> his brother וַיַּהַרְגֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2026> and slew him

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to קַ֔יִן <WH7014> unto Cain אֵ֖י <WH335> Where הֶ֣בֶל <WH1893> [is] Abel אָחִ֑יךָ <WH251> not [Am] I my brother's וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> I know הֲשֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> keeper אָחִ֖י <WH251> my brother's אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> He

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said מֶ֣ה <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> hast thou done ק֚וֹל <WH6963> ? the voice דְּמֵ֣י <WH1818> blood אָחִ֔יךָ <WH251> of thy brother's צֹעֲקִ֥ים <WH6817> crieth אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> unto me from the ground

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now אָר֣וּר <WH779> And now [art] thou cursed אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> from the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which פָּצְתָ֣ה <WH6475> which hath opened אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֔יהָ <WH6310> her mouth לָקַ֛חַת <WH3947> to receive אֶת־ <WH853> דְּמֵ֥י <WH1818> blood אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> thy brother's מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> from thy hand

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When תַֽעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> thou tillest אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> the ground לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no תֹסֵ֥ף <WH3254> it shall not henceforth תֵּת־ <WH5414> yield כֹּחָ֖הּ <WH3581> unto thee her strength לָ֑ךְ נָ֥ע <WH5128> a fugitive וָנָ֖ד <WH5110> and a vagabond תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> shalt thou be in the earth
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said קַ֖יִן <WH7014> And Cain אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> [is] greater עֲוֹנִ֖י <WH5771> My punishment מִנְּשֹֽׂא׃ <WH5375> than I can bear

הֵן֩ <WH2005> Behold גֵּרַ֨שְׁתָּ <WH1644> Behold thou hast driven me out אֹתִ֜י <WH853> הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> this day מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> and from פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> of the earth וּמִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thy face אֶסָּתֵ֑ר <WH5641> shall I be hid וְהָיִ֜יתִי <WH1961> and it shall come to pass נָ֤ע <WH5128> and I shall be a fugitive וָנָד֙ <WH5110> and a vagabond בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become כָל־ <WH3605> and whoever מֹצְאִ֖י <WH4672> [that] every one that findeth me יַֽהַרְגֵֽנִי׃ <WH2026> shall slay me

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said ל֣וֹ יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> unto him Therefore כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הֹרֵ֣ג <WH2026> whosoever slayeth קַ֔יִן <WH7014> Cain שִׁבְעָתַ֖יִם <WH7659> on him sevenfold יֻקָּ֑ם <WH5358> vengeance shall be taken וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> set יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD לְקַ֙יִן֙ <WH7014> upon Cain א֔וֹת <WH226> a mark לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> lest הַכּוֹת־ <WH5221> him should kill אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> no מֹצְאֽוֹ׃ <WH4672> any finding

וַיֵּ֥צֵא <WH3318> went out קַ֖יִן <WH7014> And Cain מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the presence יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land נ֖וֹד <WH5113> of Nod קִדְמַת־ <WH6926> on the east עֵֽדֶן׃ <WH5731> of Eden

וַיֵּ֤דַע <WH3045> knew קַ֙יִן֙ <WH7014> And Cain אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare אֶת־ <WH853> חֲנ֑וֹךְ <WH2585> Enoch וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בֹּ֣נֶה <WH1129> and he builded עִ֔יר <WH5892> a city וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and called שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city כְּשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> after the name בְּנ֥וֹ <WH1121> of his son חֲנֽוֹךְ׃ <WH2585> Enoch

וַיִּוָּלֵ֤ד <WH3205> was born לַֽחֲנוֹךְ֙ <WH2585> And unto Enoch אֶת־ <WH853> עִירָ֔ד <WH5897> Irad וְעִירָ֕ד <WH5897> and Irad יָלַ֖ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> מְחֽוּיָאֵ֑ל <WH4232> Mehujael וּמְחִיּיָאֵ֗ל <WH4232> and Mehujael יָלַד֙ <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> מְת֣וּשָׁאֵ֔ל <WH4967> Methusael וּמְתוּשָׁאֵ֖ל <WH4967> and Methusael יָלַ֥ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> לָֽמֶךְ׃ <WH3929> Lamech

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> took ל֥וֹ לֶ֖מֶךְ <WH3929> And Lamech שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> unto him two נָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> wives שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <WH259> of the one עָדָ֔ה <WH5711> [was] Adah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> of the other צִלָּֽה׃ <WH6741> Zillah

וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> bare עָדָ֖ה <WH5711> And Adah אֶת־ <WH853> יָבָ֑ל <WH2989> Jabal ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> was אֲבִ֕י <WH1> he was the father יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> of such as dwell אֹ֖הֶל <WH168> in tents וּמִקְנֶֽה׃ <WH4735> and [of such as have] cattle

וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name אָחִ֖יו <WH251> And his brother's יוּבָ֑ל <WH3106> [was] Jubal ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> become אֲבִ֕י <WH1> he was the father כָּל־ <WH3605> of all תֹּפֵ֥שׂ <WH8610> of all such as handle כִּנּ֖וֹר <WH3658> the harp וְעוּגָֽב׃ <WH5748> and organ

וְצִלָּ֣ה <WH6741> And Zillah גַם־ <WH1571> also הִ֗וא <WH1931> he יָֽלְדָה֙ <WH3205> she also bare אֶת־ <WH853> תּ֣וּבַל קַ֔יִן <WH8423> Tubalcain לֹטֵ֕שׁ <WH3913> an instructer כָּל־ <WH3605> of all חֹרֵ֥שׁ <WH2794> of every artificer נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> in brass וּבַרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> and iron וַֽאֲח֥וֹת <WH269> and the sister תּֽוּבַל־ קַ֖יִן <WH8423> of Tubalcain נַֽעֲמָֽה׃ <WH5279> [was] Naamah

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said לֶ֜מֶךְ <WH3929> And Lamech לְנָשָׁ֗יו <WH802> unto his wives עָדָ֤ה <WH5711> Adah וְצִלָּה֙ <WH6741> and Zillah שְׁמַ֣עַן <WH8085> Hear קוֹלִ֔י <WH6963> my voice נְשֵׁ֣י <WH802> ye wives לֶ֔מֶךְ <WH3929> of Lamech הַאְזֵ֖נָּה <WH238> hearken אִמְרָתִ֑י <WH565> unto my speech כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִ֤ישׁ <WH582> I הָרַ֙גְתִּי֙ <WH2026> for I have slain לְפִצְעִ֔י <WH6482> to my wounding וְיֶ֖לֶד <WH3206> and a young man לְחַבֻּרָתִֽי׃ <WH2250> to my hurt

כִּ֥י <WH3588> If שִׁבְעָתַ֖יִם <WH7659> sevenfold יֻקַּם־ <WH5358> shall be avenged קָ֑יִן <WH7014> Cain וְלֶ֖מֶךְ <WH3929> truly Lamech שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> and sevenfold

וַיֵּ֨דַע <WH3045> knew אָדָ֥ם <WH121> Adam עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and she bare בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שֵׁ֑ת <WH8352> Seth כִּ֣י <WH3588> whom שָֽׁת־ <WH7896> [said she] hath appointed לִ֤י אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> For God זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> seed אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> me another תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> instead הֶ֔בֶל <WH1893> of Abel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הֲרָג֖וֹ <WH2026> slew קָֽיִן׃ <WH7014> Cain

וּלְשֵׁ֤ת <WH8352> And to Seth גַּם־ <WH1571> also הוּא֙ <WH1931> to him יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> also there was born בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and he called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <WH583> Enos אָ֣ז <WH227> Then הוּחַ֔ל <WH2490> then began men לִקְרֹ֖א <WH7121> to call בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> upon the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ
